alert.note: Alert for Bronx; Kings (Brooklyn); New York (Manhattan); Northern Queens; Northern Westchester; Richmond (Staten Is.); Rockland; Southern Westchester (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 11:21PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Hudson, eastern Passaic, Union, Bergen, Essex, southern Westchester, Queens, Bronx, Richmond, Kings, Rockland and New York (Manhattan) Counties through 1215 AM EDT... At 1121 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Riverdale to Madison to Belle Mead. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Summit and Pompton Lakes around 1125 PM EDT. Wayne and Millburn around 1130 PM EDT. Ramsey and Caldwell around 1135 PM EDT. Paterson and Orange around 1140 PM EDT. Newark and Elizabeth around 1145 PM EDT. Passaic and Hackensack around 1150 PM EDT. Bayonne and Bergenfield around 1155 PM EDT. Jersey City and Hoboken around 1200 AM EDT. Tarrytown and Dobbs Ferry around 1205 AM EDT. Yonkers and Flatbush around 1210 AM EDT. New Rochelle and Flushing around 1215 AM EDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
